scenario.name: Outbound call scenario - Oracle SBC SIPREC (mono)
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Call-ID: [call_id] To: <sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport]> Contact: <sip:acmeSrc@[local_ip]:[local_port];tranport=[transport]>;+sip.src From: <sip:acmeSrc@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Require: siprec Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=unique-boundary-1 Content-Length: [len] MIME-Version: 1.0
--unique-boundary-1 Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 7097 237305 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 0 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=label:16777227 a=sendonly
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 3536141446 3536141446 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=ptime:20 a=label:1
--unique-boundary-1 Content-Type: application/rs-metadata+xml Content-Disposition: recording-session
